channel.title: Good TV shows/ Movies on Netflix?
channel.description:
taking some medication that makes me stay up, gonna be up for a day or two. Need some good shows. already saw
- Blue Mountain state - The office - Lost - RJ berger
yeah... any others would be awesome!

item.title: Good TV shows/ Movies on Netflix?
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:8, topic:437871”]Netflix is getting pretty boring for me too because I’ve watched shit tons on it.
-Workaholics
-Criss angel mindfreak (just tryna figure out how he does some of the stuff is pretty cool)
-Futurama
-Super Trooper
-The Union (More like a documentary)
-Roast of Charlie Sheen (was so staged it was highlarious)
-The walking dead ( They only have a few episodes on there)
-13 assasins
-paranormal activity 2[/quote]

frogot already watched workohlics. will def check out chris angel though!

Read full topic

item.title: Good TV shows/ Movies on Netflix?
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:4, topic:437871”][quote author=Chrix link=topic=540587.msg3959101#msg3959101 date=1333083006]
Breaking bad - Tv show
[/quote]
Isnt that the show about a science teacher that makes meth? I think i was the Pilot episode.[/quote]

A chemistry teacher named Walter has been diagnosed with lung cancer and does not have enough money to keep his family well off after his death so he apprentices a student that is known for selling drugs to help him manufacture and sell meth. It’s a great show you should check it you might like it.

Read full topic
